consentModal.title: We use cookies
consentModal.description: We use cookies to personalize content and ads, to provide social media features and to analyze traffic to our services. We also share information about your use of our Services with our social media, advertising and analytics partners. Our partners may combine this information with other data that you have provided to them or that they have collected as part of your use of the Services. Functional cookies are necessary. All other cookies are optional.
consentModal.footer: Privacy policy Imprint Terms and Conditions

sections.title: Cookie Usage
sections.description: Here you will find an overview of all cookies used. You can give your consent to entire categories or display further information and thus only select certain cookies.

sections.title: Strictly Necessary Cookies Always Enabled
sections.description: Essential cookies enable basic functions and are necessary for the proper functioning of the website.

sections.title: Analytics Cookies
sections.description: Statistics cookies collect information anonymously. This information helps us to understand how our visitors use our website.

sections.title: Marketing Cookies
sections.description: These cookies are used by us to provide you with advertising that may be relevant to your interests. These cookies enable, for example, the sharing of pages via social networks and the posting of comments. Offers that may match your interests are also displayed. You can change your personal settings for marketing cookies by clicking on the corresponding opt-out link.
